author: Belinda Ang Saw Ean J:
casename: Dayco Products Singapore Pte Ltd (in liquidation) v Ong Cheng Aik
counsel: Ashok Kumar and Eugene Thuraisingam (Allen and Gledhill) for plaintiff; Francis Goh (Ari Goh and Partners) for defendant
tags-parsed: Companies/Directors/Duties/Breach of fiduciary duties/Whether director breached fiduciary duties by failing to disclose personal interest in transactions of company/s 156(1) Companies Act (Cap 50, 1994 Rev Ed)

Companies/Directors/Liabilities/Whether director liable to account for unauthorised profits made as a result of failure to disclose personal interest in transactions of company/Whether director liable to compensate company in damages
